OOC: Yep, ditto for me.

BIC:

Dracon smiles as he stares into the exterior=
 void as well.  He walks over to Rukus and slaps a hand on his shoulder gru=
ffly.

"This is it," he says confidently, "this is our big break."

  Rukus nods to Krhinos, "I anticipate our arrival. I h=
ave a feeling 
  that we will see action on this trip. As long as there is =
no 
  treachery from within, we can deal with anything."

  He gazes out th=
e view portal into the vast expanse. <<Here we go... 
  money's money, and =
this should provide lots of it...>>
